page.title: 15Ritual Child Ear Piercing.
page.content: My sister Jackie took me to towm with my Mum's permission to have my ears pierced. My Dad took my sister and me to town in the car. My stomach had butterflies and I was feeling quite sick. We got to Sneezum's, the shop where I was having my ears done but the assistant said that they already had 5 people waiting, so we were to go to their other shop down St. John's St. When we got there we found it only cost 1 pound 75p. I sat down in the chair. I held my breath. Â£CLICK.' "There's the first one done," she said. "Do I have to have the next one done?" I thought. But it was too late; she had done it. It stung for about an hour afterwards.
